name: Planet Defense - Protect Your Solar System
name_original: Planet Defense - Protect Your Solar System
description:
Challenge yourself as you take charge of your own Solar System, protecting your planets from incoming asteroids!

• Simple Controls: touch or tap to increase the speed that your planets orbit the sun, strategically dodging incoming asteroids.

• Earn Power-ups: collecting green fragments will give you the ability to use power-ups. These include an energy shield & the option to switch orbital direction.

• Compete With Other Players: compete on the high scores leaderboard with other players.
